r.d: This extension provides an IBM database driver for PDO. This driver supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, Apache Derby databases and IDS (Informix Data Server).
r.n: - Support for PHP 8.5 - A PDO driver class (\Pdo\Ibm) is now provided on PHP 8.4 and newer. Currently, it has no extra methods, but in PHP 8.5, the PDO constants have been moved to the \Pdo\Ibm class, and a deprecation message added to the old PDO:: constants.
